## Overview

## Getting Started

The code chunk below will install and load tidyverse and sf packages.

```{r}
pacman::p_load(sf,tidyverse,spdep)
```

Importing Geospatial Data

Importing polygon features

The code chunk below will import ESRI shapefile into R.

```{r}
hunan_sf = st_read(dsn = "data/geospatial", 
                  layer = "Hunan")
```

Importing and transforming the projected coordinates system

```{r}
# run all things in one goal using %>%
preschool = st_read("data1/geospatial/pre-schools-location-kml.kml") %>% st_transform(crs = 3414)
```

Importing attribute data in csv

```{r}
hunan <- read_csv("data/aspatial/Hunan_2012.csv")
```
